page.title: 15 Education in Beccles.
page.content: Beccles comes under the Suffolk County Council Education Committee and uses the 3 tier comprehensive system. PRIMARY-Ravensmere Infant Sch. St. Benedicts Rd. has 26 pupils aged 5-7. Albert Pye Primary,Fredericks Rd has 236 pupils from 5-9 and a nursery of 50 part time places.Crowfoot Primary, Ellough Rd has 189 pupils from 5-9 and a special class.St Benets RCVC Primary Ringsfield Rd has 65 pupils from 5-11. MIDDLE-Beccles Middle School,Castle Hill has 460 pupils from 9-13. HIGH-Sir John Leman,Ringsfield Road has 1,100 pupils from 13-18 and takes them from Beccles,west to Shipmeadow, east to Kessingland,north to Norfolk and south to Southwold.It also acts as a 6th form for Reydon High School.
